alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Jackson; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 10:55PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN OGLALA LAKOTA... SOUTHWESTERN JACKSON AND BENNETT COUNTIES THROUGH 1130 PM MDT... At 1055 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles north of Evergreen to Swett to 10 miles southwest of Martin. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Martin, Porcupine, Kyle, Potato Creek, Allen, Batesland, Tuthill, Hisle, Wakpamni, Swett, LaCreek North Housing, Sunrise Housing, Kyle North Route Housing, Yellow Bear Canyon, Eagle Nest Butte, Snake Butte, Lacreek Wildlife Refuge, and Pine Ridge Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
